title: Pbe with my main account
body:
Hi,
resent i have been accepted on the PBE so i have downloaded the client. I have logged in on my main account (vintaam) but when i am in the shop my  account has 0RP and 0IP i have wated over a night to see if it maby takes a while but now its for weaks ago and i still dont have any IP and RP. I do have played some games on the PBE servers. I hope that somone of you can help me awsnering my question. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
Since this is specific to the PBE account you're inquiring about, we'll need to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). A specialist will be able to look into this and work with you on a solution.

Let me know if you have any questions.
